synopsis.text:
Matchstick Girl, The Gigantic Turnip, Arthurian legends, and The Ramayana. Hazuki, chosen by Cinderella, embarks on a magical journey at the school, forming a cherished friendship with Shizuka.

In a world where the power of stories comes alive, Hazuki Kagimura, an ordinary girl with a vivid imagination, discovers her true potential. Struggling to connect with her new family, Hazuki finds solace in the enchanting tales that transport her to realms beyond her mundane existence. One fateful day, she stumbles upon a hidden library and encounters Shizuka Tsuchimikado, a fellow dreamer who introduces her to a magical school.

At this extraordinary academy, Hazuki learns that she has been selected by the timeless story of Cinderella to become an Origin Master, a wielder of powerful magic drawn from the essence of classic folktales and legends. Alongside Shizuka and other gifted girls, Hazuki delves into the captivating world of magic, forging friendships and overcoming challenges as she learns to harness her newfound abilities.

As Hazuki embraces her destiny as a Märchen Mädchen, she discovers the strength to conquer her fears and create her own remarkable story, weaving together the threads of friendship, adventure, and self-discovery in this enchanting tale of magic and wonder.
